properties.notes: Davis library; students study here, especially during midterms and finals
McCorkle Place; former location of Silent Sam, a Confederate statue that was the site of many protests recently
the Old Well is a symbol of the UNC; people like to take pics and drink water from the fountain for good luck
Student Union; many clubs and organizations meet here and Wendy's is open until 1am in this building
this bus stop links Chapel Hill's transit system to GoTriangle; can go to Southpoint or Raleigh
